thread.title: This Twitter Page Dedicated To Bringing You 'N'Golo Kante Facts' Is Gold
thread.title_full: This Twitter Page Dedicated To Bringing You 'N'Golo Kante Facts' Is Gold

title: This Twitter Page Dedicated To Bringing You 'N'Golo Kante Facts' Is Gold
text:
This Twitter Page Dedicated To Bringing You 'N'Golo Kante Facts' Is Gold Wed Feb 22 2017 15:56:00   15:56:00 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
Six months after Claudio Ranieri sold N'Golo Kante to Chelsea, the French midfielder is relishing his opportunities under Antonio Conte, while Premier League champions Leicester hover over the relegation zone with five wins in 24 games. 
If you haven't already read Kante's incredible story , I suggest you give it a read, but it comes as no surprise that Kante is revelling in such a talented Chelsea side this season. 
He has produced time and time again for the Blues in recent weeks and continues to impress at Stamford Bridge. 
In honour of the talented midfielder, someone has dedicated a Twitter account revealing some of N'Golo Kante's greatest facts. 100% legitimate, no white lies here. 
Some of my personal favourites include: "N'golo Kante can get a Egg McMuffin at McDonald's after 10-30am" and "Claude Makelele's room is covered in pictures of N'Golo Kante ". 
Four years ago, Kante wasn't even playing regular first team football in the French 3rd division, but now the 25-year-old has a dedicated Twitter facts account. This is what dreams are made of. 
Here are some of the best tweets from @KanteFacts 
Brilliant.
